mapper.select: select b.article_no, b.subject, m.name, b.hit, b.register_time from board b, member m where b.user_id = m.id order by article_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into board (user_id, subject, content, hit, register_time) values (#{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, now())
